snippet.title: Out of Line Gameplay Trailer May 2021
snippet.description:
Out of Line Gameplay Trailer  May 2021 edition

Out of Line is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer that depicts the adventures of San, a young boy trapped in a factory controlled by an ominous and strange entity. As San collects memories and solves puzzles to  unearth fragments of his identity and discover the true meaning of freedom.


Out of Line is available NOW. Find it here: 



✹ Steam - https://bit.ly/2ULexFY
✹ Epic Games Store  - https://bit.ly/3doFRjD
✹ GOG - https://bit.ly/2SwFc8C
✹ Gamesplanet - https://bit.ly/3gZFHRT
✹ Humble Store - https://bit.ly/3A6tSkp



Add Out of Line on your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419290/Out_of_Line/




Enjoy dozens of beautiful puzzles  
Learn to master the mechanics of  the spear
Interact with environments 
Learn to get precious help from extraordinary characters
Discover the story of San and make it your own interpretation       


More info about Out of Line:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hatinh_Games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hatinhinteractive
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hatinhinteractive
